title: Add deposit note under each pricing plan

requirements.summary: Add a visually subordinate, dark-theme-readable deposit note under each Basic/Standard/Premium pricing plan stating “$50 deposit required” plus a brief reason.
acceptanceCriteria: Each of the three pricing cards (Basic, Standard, Premium) displays the exact phrase “$50 deposit required”.
Each pricing card includes 1 short sentence of reasoning next to or below the deposit phrase (e.g., mentions building a website preview/prototype).
The deposit note is displayed consistently across all plans and does not break the existing layout on mobile or desktop.

file_operations.description: Update the PricingSection card markup to render a consistent small/muted deposit note under each plan description, containing the exact phrase “$50 deposit required” and one short English sentence explaining it covers initial work such as creating a website preview/prototype; ensure styling remains visually subordinate (e.g., smaller text + muted color) yet readable in the dark theme and does not affect the grid/layout on mobile/desktop.
